block.minecraft.spawn.not_valid: Your spawn point was destroyed, obstructed, or otherwise inaccessible.
text.autoconfig.homecamp.title: Home Camp Config
text.autoconfig.homecamp.option.soulCamp: If true, only Soul Campfires can be used as a spawnpoint.
text.autoconfig.homecamp.option.extingui: If true, the campfire will be extinguished when the player spawns there.
text.autoconfig.homecamp.option.requireL: If true, campfires can only be spawned at if they are lit.
